Policy.acknowledgement_statement: A sample statement for the acknowledgment of the NHLBI GO-ESP Family Studies: Familial Interstitial Pneumonia dataset(s) follows: “The authors wish to acknowledge the support of the National Heart, Lung and Blood Institute (NHLBI) and the contributions of the research institutions, study investigators, field staff and study participants in creating this resource for biomedical research. This study is part of the NHLBI Grand Opportunity Exome Sequencing Project (GO-ESP). Funding for GO-ESP was provided by NHLBI grants RC2 HL103010 (HeartGO), RC2 HL102923 (LungGO) and RC2 HL102924 (WHISP). The exome sequencing was performed through NHLBI grants RC2 HL102925 (BroadGO) and RC2 HL102926 (SeattleGO). The Familial Interstitial Pneumonia study received support from an NHLBI grant (PI: DA Schwartz; U01 HL067467), intramural research support (PI: DA Schwartz; Z01-ES101947) and two NHLBI grants (PI: Schwartz; RO1-HL097163 and P01-HL092870).“
Policy.ic_specific_access_term: The data are limited to use by researchers studying lung diseases. This consent group does not require IRB approval.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution responded that the study is not sensitive without submitting a new Institutional Certification)
